summary: A tribute to jazz diva Anita O'Day, completed just weeks before her death in November 2006.
cast: Anita O'Day|Louis Armstrong|Buddy Bregman|Dick Cavett|Leonard Feather|Will Friedwald|Russell Garcia|Willis Holman|Eddie Locke|Johnny Mandel|John Cameron Mitchell|John Poole|Denny Roach|Annie Ross|Billy Taylor|George Wein|Margaret Whiting|Joe Wilder|Gerald Wilson
title: Anita O'Day: The Life of a Jazz Singer
